Package uk.ac.soton.ecs.comp1206.labtestlibrary.parse

Class JavaFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.soton.ecs.comp1206.labtestlibrary.parse.JavaFile
  • public class JavaFile
extends Object
    Represents a java file parsed in from the file system. Allows to get information from the loaded class and run a number of tests. Strictly, the file does not have to be a compilable java file but has to contain valid java syntax.
    Author:
    jan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description

      Parses a java file from an file.

      Parses a java file from an input stream.

      Parses a java file at the path location.
      JavaFile​(Path pathToFile)
      Parses a java file from a path.

    • Method Detail

      • getClassByName

        public Optional<Class> getClassByName​(String name)
        Checks if the class is present in the java file and returns an optional of it if it is present.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the class.
        Returns:
        Either the class or an empty optional.

      • runCheckForBadStatements

        public RecursionChecker runCheckForBadStatements​(String className)
                                          throws FileNotFoundException
        Runs through all methods of the class to see if any loops where used.
        Parameters:
        className - The name of the class to check for loops.
        Returns:
        The adapter that ran through the code of the class and contains the results.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
